nodes.text: Pellko was a male Rodian, who lived on the planet Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Pellko worked as an information broker and had a network of informants, so knew a lot about what went on in the cities of Gadrin and Hedrett, on Cularin. He was present in the bar Spanner's in Hedrett, when it was visited by the Heroes of Cularin in about 31 BBY.
Pellko was a very fastidious person and was well-groomed. He liked to be in control of things, and liked it when people owed him favors, but hated owing debts to others.
